snippet.title: 2 Minutes in Space - A Spooky Halloween Update - Gameplay | Rarepixels.com
snippet.description:
Celebrate this Halloween in the universe with our casual sci-fi mobile game, 2 Minutes in Space!  Download FREE version NOW: www.2mis.rarepixels.com

Select your preferred spaceship and embark on a survival challenge, dodging asteroids, nebulas and a huge pumpkin 🎃 instead of the Moon!

The video is about 2 Minutes in Space: Spaceship Selection but also tries to cover the following subject:

Halloween festive gameplay
Dodging missiles and asteroids
Gold collection tips

✅ Subscribe To Our Channel For More Videos: https://www.youtube.com/@Rarepixels_MobileGames

✅ Important Links: 

👉 Website: https://www.rarepixels.com/

✅ Planes Control:
👉 Website: https://www.rarepixels.com/games/planes-control/
👉 AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/planes-control/id1015114550
👉 PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rarepixels.planeslittle

✅ 2 Minutes in Space:

👉 Website: https://www.rarepixels.com/games/2-minutes-in-space/
👉 AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/2-minutes-in-space/id1183359738
👉 PlayStore: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.rarepixels.avoidasteroids

✅  Stay Connected With Us: 

👉 Facebook Planes Control: https://www.facebook.com/planesApp
👉 Facebook 2 Minutes in Space: https://www.facebook.com/2inSpace
👉 (X)Twitter: https://twitter.com/rarepixels
👉 Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/rarepixels

==============================

✅ Other Videos You Might Be Interested In Watching: 

👉 RarePixels® Presents: Planes Control: The Ultimate Mobile Game Adventure - Gameplay | Rarepixels.com
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NbUgYm6XXro

👉 Survive The Cosmos: 2 Minutes In Space - Rarepixels' Sci-Fi Game Trailer | Rarepixels.com
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2I-41lo8ubc

👉 Mobile Game Planes Control - Spooky Halloween Update
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DcHxWFolQFM

👉 Planes Control - 🎄 Xmas 🎄 Update 2022 - Gameplay
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yR58gevjzYQ 

=============================

✅  About RarePixels: 

Welcome to the official Youtube channel of the gaming studio Rarepixels! Based in Spain, we do the best mobile games for Android and iOS platforms. You don't believe it? Check Planes Control and 2 Minutes in Space! 

Planes Control 
It's a great path drawing mobile game. All you need to do is to draw lines to safety ground all incoming aircraft to the airfields. Don't relax too fast because it’s not as easy as it sounds :) Enemies, tornadoes, blazing storms, mountains, wildfires and even aliens will make the game to an unexpected adventure. Free download here: https://pc.rarepixels.com 

2 Minutes in Space  
It's our brand new survival mobile game where a player will be thrown into a world of endless space, full of dangerous objects and challenges. The mission is simple: just survive!  Free download here: https://2mis.rarepixels.com 

¡BY THE WAY! We love to work with youtubers! Are you interested in playing our games? Drop us a message!

For Collaboration and Business inquiries, please use the contact information below:

📩  Email: contact@rarepixels.com

🔔 Subscribe to my channel for more videos: https://www.youtube.com/@Rarepixels_MobileGames 

=====================

Disclaimer: We do not accept any liability for any loss or damage which is incurred from you acting or not acting as a result of reading any of our publications. You acknowledge that you use the information we provide at your own risk. Do your own research.
